channel.title: Where the fuck did the webclient reload error fix thread go?
channel.description:
I saw a thread in this forum a few days ago that had a simple php code that would prevent the error of a webclient if you reloaded it. I think it was just 1 line of code...
Or does anybody have a different solution?

item.title: Where the fuck did the webclient reload error fix thread go?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Alphaspida, post:9, topic:390836”][quote author=mikeyboy09 link=topic=486781.msg3567869#msg3567869 date=1302807722]
Lmao, get out.
You call me a child and your the one flaming and swearing over almost nothing…
Maybe a quick Google seach would have been the answer?

  • Mikey
    [/quote]

You need to assume people like me have tried google.

And I’ll be more than happy to get out as soon as my question gets answered.[/quote]

If you need to use some other code, not included in the client, in order to get the client to work, you’re doing it wrong.
“Hacks” like that only teach you how to put a bandage on the problem. Not fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: Where the fuck did the webclient reload error fix thread go?
